CustomField.description: A classification attribute that enables sorting object-field trackers into subtypes to facilitate differentiated goal assignment.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
OPTIONAL: Type should be blank unless you plan on having different goal times for different Types of this object (eg: New Business vs Renewal Opportunities may expect different sales cycle times).
If so, put the API Name of the field youâ€™re using to identify these types here in the Type field. If you need to combine two or more fields to get all Type permutations, you can build a formula field to concatenate them, and pass that in here. Use API Name here, so for custom fields, it should end with "__c"
CustomField.label: Type
